title: Using Jordan Peterson and Meaning Crisis Language to get beyond Christianese
description:
Just had first daughter
Mother homeschooled, 
Same town as Ron Dart
Alliance church
I always affirmed the propositions but I didn’t know why i affirmed any of those things
Not comfortable using traditional Christian language
Christian language
Dallas Willard, NT Wright, Jordan Peterson Trialogue
The Divine Conspiracy
Corner of the Internet has breathed life into the Christian thought
David Fuller
Jordan Peterson Logos
Esther OReilly’s TS Eliot quote to Douglas Murray
Donating a Kidney
What do we mean by the Holy Spirit was leading him to do that
